content:
As Raven and I were sitting in the soundproof room, the door suddenly opened, and Octavia walked in. Raven turned her attention to Octavia, and I could see the look of concern on her face.

"Octavia, what's going on?" Raven asked, her voice filled with concern.

Octavia gave a look that she needed Raven, most likely due to the argument Clarke and Bellamy were having.

"I need your help, Raven," Octavia said, her voice filled with urgency.

Raven looked at me and asked, "Madi, will you be okay if I step out for a bit?"

I nodded, still able to hear the loud argument. "I'll be okay," I said, my voice filled with understanding.

Raven nodded and turned to Octavia. "Let's go," she said, her voice filled with determination.

As they left, I couldn't help but feel a sense of concern wash over me. I knew that the argument between Clarke and Bellamy was intense, and I hoped that they would be able to resolve it.

A few minutes later, Octavia and Raven came back into the room. Octavia had a look of relief on her face, and Raven looked more relaxed.

"Is everything okay?" I asked, my voice filled with concern.

Octavia nodded and said, "Yes, Madi. Everything is okay. We were able to resolve the situation."

I breathed a sigh of relief and asked, "What happened?"
